statements: DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE game_level < 5 AND progress_percent >= 50.00;
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 101 AND game_level = 5;
DELETE FROM PlayerProgress WHERE player_id = 100 AND level = 5;
DELETE FROM MovementHistory WHERE movement_id IN (SELECT movement_id FROM MovementHistory WHERE player_id = 200) AND movement_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM movement_history WHERE player_id = 200 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM gaming_experience WHERE player_id = 10 AND feedback_rating = 5;
DELETE FROM gaming_experience WHERE player_id = 222 AND feedback_rating > 3;
